intension: Craft a promotional image for a high-tech pet adoption event featuring robotic and bioengineered pets. The design should blend elements of technology with animal imagery, creating a heartwarming yet futuristic vibe.
globalcaption: The image features a small, fluffy dog with a spotted pattern, standing on a blue background. The dog appears to be a robot or a toy, as it is positioned in a way that it seems to be walking or moving. The dog is the main focus of the image, and it is surrounded by a bright blue color that contrasts with its fur.
keywords: animal, robot, technology, pet, dog, robotic, bioengineered, puppy, blue, adoption, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue background with a pink square in the center. The pink square is surrounded by a few white stars, which are scattered around it. The stars are of varying sizes and are positioned at different angles, creating a visually interesting scene

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a small, fluffy dog standing on its hind legs, appearing to be looking up at something. The dog is positioned in the center of the scene, and its front legs are raised off the ground. The background is white, which creates a clean and simple backdrop for the dog
